name: Candlestickman
description:
5 minutes arcade about Candlestickman, whose life is hard and very stock exchange specific.

WASD or Arrows to move and jump. Space and Enter to start.

(If life is too hard you can use a secret K key.)

Ludum Dare 44 Jam submission.

Please rate it here https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/candlestickman
